title: Ultimate Wav Resizer G-Wavdown
description:
ULTIMATE WAV RESIZER -- G-WAVDOWN -- THE WAVDOWN WITH AUDIO GAIN

G-WAVDOWN will convert fast any number of wavs to tiny size wavs keeping audio quality in a directory with audio gain change using a very friendly gui at the start of the conversion , the values of the audio gain on the gui are editable at the config.ini on the tmp folder

WHY G-WAVDOWN ? because after the WAVDOWN make i detected after tests that besides the converted wavs keeps positive audio quality the tonality of the audio have a tendence to decrease a bit because the natural downsampling of the wavs , so under this facts if with give some audio gain in decibels to the wavs , the converted wavs not only donÃ‚Â´t  loose any tonality but also can increases the volume , my advice goes to some more gain 5 or 10 decibels but this values are editable on the tool and can go probably to more 100 if wanted but more than that not recomendable because possible distortion of the audio ... happy tool ...


Instructions

tested successfully in thousends of normal wavs 16PCM 44100Hz in hundreds of folders,convert in very fast way the normal wavs to tiny size PLAYABLE wavs 

PROCEDURE :

Copy to the normal wavs directory the G-WAVDOWN.exe and the tmp folder and run it then 
choose the audio gain of the converted wavs and wait for
the downsampling of the wavs

To convert back the tiny size playable wavs in normal wav 16PCM 44100Hz 
use the WAVUP.exe on the wavs directory and wait the conversion work


NOTES : 

- can happen that other type of wavs with different attributes works
with the G-WAVDOWN.exe but when using the WAVUP.exe the tiny playable wavs
will be converted to normal wavs 16PCM 44100 Hz

- the audio gain is editable at the config.ini on the tmp folder


suggestion : 

CELLPHONES AUDIO :   COMPLETE ALBUNS FOR LOWER SIZES IN WAV AUDIO



* enjoy ...


* ULTIMATE WAV RESIZER -- G-WAVDOWN -- GLOBE FREEWARE -- 2013 *
